name: protean
effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

flavor_text.x_y: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.
